reviews.review:
it is an amazing game if you would like to take your mind of other things and focus on the hard, but not too hard puzzles the game offers, the game play is perfectly complimented by the compelling story and likable and like-to-hate characters, glados for instance is a good character, she is funny and good to listen too.
the environments are beautiful and the sense of scale, the environments compliment the constant story beats of YOU being small. i recommend this to people of all ages except if your a baby that cant look around and connect dots to solve big puzzles. valve did a great job crafting this amazing game, its charismatic and overall a fun time.
I liked it especially at the end damnnn i would recommend this game

When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your Damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man who's gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!

Portal 2 is unique, hilarious and has enough storytelling to make a book based on the lore. Probably one of the greatest game I've played and I still love it as much as I did the first time I played. I recommend this game to all people because this game has something for everyone. 10/10 would recommend.
This game is awesome, but it could be EPIC if you add BASS to the equipment.
great game, great character, great story, great everything
the best game of puzzle EVER

This is my favorite game of all time! The puzzles are absolutely amazing, and so much fun to play through. However the reason I really love this game is the storyline. It is brilliantly written and it is the reason I continue to replay this game over and over. I would definitely recommend that you play this game!
